video_description: Indian Motorcycle of Daytona Beach will soon become the newest Victory Dealer in the USA. While at Daytona Bike Week, I had the pleasure of meeting the dealership owner and he gave me an introduction to the current Indian Motorcycle lineup.
title: A Beginner's Guide To Indian Motorcycles

comments.text: The Dark Horse very Cool Vintage looking bike .﻿
comments.author: Todd Pattison

comments.text: In fact﻿ it is a flagship bike, wonderful motorcycle.
comments.author: Dracuwiccan

comments.text: Nice but very﻿ pricy. I hope Victory makes these so we all can have one if we so desire.
comments.author: MrTdog45

comments.text: please dont let the design of victory influence indian old school look. Vintage is top seller for﻿ a reason people want that cool old school look. Also the stage 1 exhaust needs to be the pipe the motorcycle comes with  the stock exhaust sucks period it chokes the bike and sounds like a sewing machine other than that they are the best bike in the world I owned a victory and now own a Harley and 2010 chief Darkhoese the Indian kicks all their  asses no comparison monster bike plenty of power
comments.author: Ty Andrews

comments.text: Flip -Up LICENSE PLATE motorized kit﻿ by trydeal
comments.author: LicensePlate HideKit

comments.text: The up side, these are amazingly awesome bikes! We were seriously interested in purchasing a chief vintage, but six Indian dealers nationwide . . .Yeah, I can see driving five hundred miles for service. Also, trying to get a reasonable test ride on a chief was worse than pulling teeth, so thanks again Indian for the wasted drive to the Chicago dealer, which﻿ is now closed.
comments.author: fearsomegladiator

comments.text: Motorcycles and scooters can﻿ be rented in many cities. Wearing protective headgear is mandatory for both the rider and the pillion-rider in most cities
comments.author: lov son

comments.text: They eventually acquired licence for the﻿ Li150 series model, of which they began full-fledged production from the early sixties onwards
comments.author: lov son

comments.text: They are very expensive, but I read that they focus on quality and exclusivity. I would love to﻿ ride one and see if its really worth the steep price. Beautiful bikes tho. Absolutely amazing looking. Have a nice day! ^^
